analysis.key_quote: I oppose the new rule regarding Docket ID: OPM-2025-0004 or RIN 3206-AO80 which will reclassify 50,000 federal workers, making it easier to let them go for political reasons.
analysis.rationale: The comment explicitly opposes the proposed rule, highlighting concerns about politicization of the civil service and the erosion of trust in government, which aligns with the themes of merit-based systems and due process.
